title: Other Notable Moments
description:
# Other Notable Moments

- **Looking directly at the solar eclipse (2017)** after being warned not to [Source: Photos, August 21, 2017]
- **"Covfefe" tweet (2017)** - never explained [Source: Twitter, May 31, 2017: "Despite the constant negative press covfefe"]
- **"I know words. I have the best words."** [Source: Campaign rally, 2015]
- **Bragged about passing a cognitive test** repeatedly, describing it as very difficult: "Person. Woman. Man. Camera. TV." [Source: Fox News interview, July 2020]
- **Abortion flip-flop within hours:** Said women should face "some form of punishment" for abortions, then completely reversed himself hours later [Source: CNN, 2016]
